p: Total amount of EO hydrodistilled from the dried samples of giant hogweed collected on July was 0.91% of dry mass. There were identified 35 components which constituted 98.0% of total compounds. Dominant components were octyl acetate (62.6%), hexyl 2-methylburate (10.7%), hexyl isobutyrate (7.5%) and hexyl butyrate (6.5%). Four other components (octanal, hexyl acetate, hexyl hexanoate and octyl 2-methylbutyrate) were in the amounts slightly over 1% ( Table 1). The rest of identified components were in the amounts below 1%.
